safeHaagaHelia.title: A safe Haaga-Helia
description: üéì The aim of Haaga-Helias safety work is to ensure that every person on campus feels safe, whether they are working, studying or just visiting. You are for your part contributing to the creation of a safe and comfortable working and learning environment and a thriving Haaga-Helia community. Safety and well-being are achieved more effectively when we work together!
In this safety orientation you will receive information on the following safety-related matters:
